channel.title: 1.1.0 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## QoL: * Overhauled the lobby and in-game UI. * If you leave games while dead, you will still earn 40% of the gold you would've gained had you stayed once that game ends. If you already completed your objective, you'll get the full gold amount you'd normally win. * You can now copy things from other players' journals. * The starting King is now always player 1. * Added the ability to mute players in-game. * Knight's Sacrifice ability has been renamed to Defend.
## General: * Added Emotes (NOT EMOJIS) for purchase in the store. You can use your currently equipped emote once a day. * Added Deathnote colors for purchase in the store. You can use all the colors you purchase for your deathnotes. * Players who are blocked from voting will now be shown as abstaining during trials. * Added Casual game mode.
## Minor Class/Ability Changes: ### ALL GAME MODES > #### Butler: > * `Nightshade Wine will once again take two days to kill the King.` **REVERTED** > * **Nightshade Wine will no longer notify the King and will kill the same day.** > * Concentrated Wine no longer says you were occupied while visiting target. Now has a more generic message. > > #### Drunk: > * Happy Hour now has a more generic message. > > #### King: > * Order Execution will now only announce the kill when it succeeds. > * `Evil King now has a 30% chance to spawn and Neutral has a 10%.` **CHANGED** > * **Evil King now has a 35% chance of spawning and Good King a 65%. Neutral King can no longer spawn at the start.** > > #### Mastermind: > * If someone tries to redirect them, they will know who they would've been redirect to. > > #### Mercenary: > * Can no longer accuse their target of treason. > * They will automatically vote to pardon their target. > > #### Possessor: > * Unlimited uses of Facelift. X > * Possess reduced to 2 uses and you will now get your target's deathnote. > > #### Reaper: > * Icy Touch - Chilled players can no longer talk to the dead and are instead silenced. > > #### Scorned: > * **Will now commit suicide after winning. (REMOVED)** > * Abilities will be disabled after winning, but can leave after winning and get their winning at the end of the game.
### CLASSIC MODE > #### Inquisitor: > * **Will now commit suicide after the Sorcerer dies. (REMOVED)** > * Abilities will be disabled after winning, but can leave after winning and get their winning at the end of the game. > * Ruthless Efficiency will now kill all targets, but will only bypass the Sorcerer's night immunity. > > #### Sorcerer: > * Magic Cloak will now make the Sorcerer appear as a non-magic user to the Inquisitor in addition it its current effects.
## Major Class/Ability Changes:
### ALL GAME MODES > #### Physician: > * Reanimate removed > * Added Day Ability Inoculate - Make a player immune to Nightshade and bleeding. Does not cure it. 1 use. (Credit to Livicus for the ability idea) > * Added Night Ability Self-Care - If you are attacked tonight, you will heal yourself. 2 uses. > > #### Princess: > * Changed Will-o-Wisp - Tells you if the target attacks anyone tonight. Only detects attacks that count as visiting. 2 uses. > > #### Psychic: > * Renamed to Mystic. > * No longer has Call of The Dead. > * No longer unique > * New Night Ability Conduit - Allow two players to talk to each other for the rest of the night. You will be able to hear, but not speak to them. 2 uses. (Credit to NuclearBurrito for the ability idea) > * **Link Minds and Conduit will not work on other linked players, reaped players, or other Mystics. (REMOVED THE INABILITY TO LINK PRINCE OR JAILED TARGETS).**
### CLASSIC MODE > #### Apostle: > * Replaced Cult Numbers with Telepathy. 2 uses
## Casual Mode Overview: * The Blue Dragon classes that can spawn are - Butler, Knight, Mystic, Physician, Prince, Princess, and Sheriff. * There can be up to 3 of each non-unique Blue Dragon class. * Fool, Sorcerer, and Inquisitor cannot spawn. * Cult and Paladin cannot spawn. * No Royal Blood passives.
________________________
**EDIT:**
## Additional changes: * In v1.1.1, added "Streamer Mode" via options. * Randomize gear no longer considers your starting gear. * Discord Rich Presence is now live! ![image|233x126](upload://nb0LV6Vi3bkaeSxeAk3zfvy7Azz.png)

item.title: 1.1.0 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Morcille
item.description:
The game is quite a mess right now. With butlers just poisoning randomly and dooming BD. And quite honestly this new italic font of the logs is making me sick. The interface was very good. With that brown colour instead of this high contract stuff that hurts the eyes. I could get used to the latter but the new italic font is unforgivable.

Read full topic
